distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gsl fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-35357: Fixed a stack out of bounds read in gsl_stats_quantile_from_sorted_data(). (bsc#1214681)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A buffer overflow can occur when calculating the quantile value using the Statistics Library of GSL (GNU Scientific Library), versions 2.5 and 2.6. Processing a maliciously crafted input data for gsl_stats_quantile_from_sorted_data of the library may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution.
notes.title: CVE description
